ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] fear kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not of appropriate level to fear kite yet, but from what I ve read, the suggestion is to twist only fear and chains, that way if you get a resist, you can
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not of appropriate level to fear kite yet, but from what I've read, the
suggestion is to twist only fear and chains, that way if you get a resist,
you can immediately fear again and get a second shot. Someone with more
know should be able to answer, but I thought I'd pass on what I've read.

Gilgurth
Bard of 24 Winces
E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [ mailto:atlatyl@... <mailto:atlatyl@...> ]
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 8:19 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com <mailto:eqbards@egroups.com>
Subject: [eqbards] fear kiting

[snip]

So I chain - fear - DDD rinse and repeat.
Weapons are a thulian claw and silvery axe.
[snip]
